name: syphilitic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
suffering from or caused by syphilis (= a disease spread by sexual activity): It's thought he may have been syphilitic. a syphilitic infection See
syphilis
More examplesFewer examplesSome 10 per cent of patients with late, untreated syphilis will go on to develop syphilitic complications involving the heart and major blood-vessels.The likelihood of a syphilitic mother passing the infection on when she is pregnant diminishes the longer she has had the disease.His father was syphilitic, blind and later went mad.

someone who has syphilis: the wife of a syphiltic See
syphilis
More examplesFewer examplesTheodore thought of his future as a syphilitic.These stigmata are not invariable and many congenital syphilitics bear only positive blood tests as evidence of their congenital disease.
